title: Extraordinary Genius - Novel Updates
tags: Arrogant Characters   Business Management   Businessmen   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Discrimination   Gangs   Hard-Working Protagonist   Industrialization   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Modern Day   Modern Knowledge   Money Grubber   Nationalism   Politics   Polygamy   Poor to Rich   Racism   Romantic Subplot   Second Chance   Shameless Protagonist   Tragic Past
author: Qióng sì   穷四
description: A failed investor from 2017 got drunk and woke up in the 1980s. China is just opening up, and the economy is blooming. There is also the dissolution of the Soviet Union, the bursting of the Dot-com bubble and other financial crisis. He used his knowledge of the future and slowly build up his empire.>
